questions.question: Where do I enjoy the room's attention being casted on?
questions.leftAnswer: I enjoy being the center of attention
questions.rightAnswer: I enjoy watching the spotlight casted onto someone else

questions.question: How often am I on my phone?
questions.leftAnswer: I only use it to text

questions.question: How do I view exercise?
questions.leftAnswer: I exercise frequently and take fitness seriously

questions.question: How do I handle conflict?
questions.rightAnswer: I confront conflict head on despite it being uncomfortable

questions.question: How do I recharge my battery?
questions.leftAnswer: I recharge best when I am alone
questions.rightAnswer: I recharge best when I am with other people

questions.question: How do I hold onto resentment?
questions.rightAnswer: I can hold a grudge until I die

questions.question: How do I view other people's opinions
How do I go throughout my day?
questions.rightAnswer: I go with the flow and do whatever pops up

questions.question: How do I view the idea of people being imprisoned as a form of punishment?
How do I view other people's opinions about me?
questions.leftAnswer: I will change something about myself to fit in
questions.rightAnswer: I don't care about what others think about me

questions.question: How do I view physical appearances?
questions.leftAnswer: Physical appearance is important to me

questions.question: Who would I rather surround myself with?
How do I handle peer pressure?
questions.leftAnswer: If all my friends were doing it, I would do it
questions.rightAnswer: If I feel strongly about something, I wont let others influence me

questions.question: How prevalent is death in my life?
questions.leftAnswer: I've had people close to me die

questions.question: Would I help my best friend get away with murder?
questions.leftAnswer: I would ask no questions and help them
